menu.menudata: select distinct contributors.id,contributors.name from contributors,contributor_track,tracks,albums where contributors.id=contributor_track.contributor and contributor_track.track=tracks.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) and tracks.album=albums.id and (albums.compilation is null or albums.compilation=0) and tracks.audio=1 group by albums.id having count(*)<6 order by contributors.namesort asc

select albums.id,albums.title from contributor_album,albums,tracks where albums.id=contributor_album.album and contributor_album.role in (1,5) and contributor_album.contributor={artist} and tracks.album=albums.id and (albums.compilation is null or albums.compilation=0) group by albums.id having count(*)<6 order by albums.titlesort asc

select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,contributor_track,albums where tracks.audio=1 and contributor_track.track=tracks.id and tracks.album={album} and contributor_track.contributor={artist} group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
